languages.text: По прошествии многих лет Высокий фактотум Янрис Данрок попросил об отставке. По его словам, возраст смягчил его сердце, и более достойный преемник, молодой и зубастый, должен был унаследовать должность. В преемниках недостатка не было — под слоем жирной плоти в груди Данрока обнаружилось сентиментальное сердце, и он не жалел средств на приют для сирот, чьи родители пали на службе Вольному Торговцу. Дети, воспитанные там, имели блестящее образование и были готовы служить династии фон Валанциус.

Many years later, High Factotum Janris Danrok sought permission to retire. He said that age had softened his heart and that a more worthy, young, and assertive successor should take over his position. There was no shortage of candidates. Under all that fat, Danrok had a sentimental heart. He spared nothing for the orphans of those who had died serving the Rogue Trader. The children were given an excellent education and were eager to serve the von Valancius dynasty.
languages.original_text: По прошествии многих лет Высокий фактотум Янрис Данрок попросил об отставке. По его словам, возраст смягчил его сердце, и более достойный преемник, молодой и зубастый, должен был унаследовать должность. В преемниках недостатка не было — под слоем жирной плоти в груди Данрока обнаружилось сентиментальное сердце, и он не жалел средств на приют для сирот, чьи родители пали на службе Вольному Торговцу. Дети, воспитанные там, имели блестящее образование и были готовы служить династии фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: Years later, High Factotum Janris Danrok asked for resignation. He said that age softened his heart, and that a more worthy successor, young and assertive, should take over the position. There was no shortage of successors. Under the mass of fat tissue, Danrok had a sentimental heart. He did not spare money for the orphanage for kids whose parents died serving the Rogue Trader. The kids had an excellent education and were ready to serve the von Valancius dynasty.

The kids had an excellent education and were ready to serve the von Valancius dynasty.

Under all that fat, Danrok had a sentimental heart. He spared nothing for the orphans of those who had died serving the Rogue Trader. Many years later, High Factotum Janris Danrok sought permission to retire. He said that age had softened his heart and that a more worthy, young, and assertive successor should take over his position. There was no shortage of candidates. Under all that fat, Danrok had a sentimental heart. He spared nothing for the orphans of those who had died serving the Rogue Trader. The children were given an excellent education and were eager to serve the von Valancius dynasty.

languages.text: 许多年后，高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克申请辞职。他说，由于年事已高，他变得越来越多愁善感，应该由更有价值、更年轻、更自信的人来接替他的位置，而这样的候选人有很多。其实，在肥胖的外表下，丹罗克藏着一颗多愁善感的心灵。他慷慨解囊，毫不吝啬地接济那些父母为行商浪人而牺牲的孤儿。那些孩子接受了良好的教育，非常渴望为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝效力。
languages.original_text: Many years later, High Factotum Janris Danrok sought permission to retire. He said that age had softened his heart and that a more worthy, young, and assertive successor should take over his position. There was no shortage of candidates. Under all that fat, Danrok had a sentimental heart. He spared nothing for the orphans of those who had died serving the Rogue Trader. The children were given an excellent education and were eager to serve the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: 多年后，高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克要求辞职。他说，由于年事已高，他变得越来越多愁善感，应该由更有价值、更年轻、更自信的人来接替他的位置，而这样的候选人有很多。其实，在肥胖的外表下，丹罗克藏着一颗多愁善感的心灵。他慷慨解囊，毫不吝啬地接济那些父母为行商浪人而牺牲的孤儿。那些孩子接受了良好的教育，非常渴望为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝效力。

languages.text: Viele Jahre später bat Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok darum, sein Amt niederlegen zu dürfen. Er sagte, das Alter habe sein Herz erweicht und ein würdigerer, jüngerer, durchsetzungsfähigerer Nachfolger solle sein Amt übernehmen. Es gab reichlich Kandidaten. Unter all dem Fett hatte Danrok ein sentimentales Herz. Für die Waisen derer, die in Diensten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gestorben waren, scheute er keine Kosten und Mühen. Die Kinder erhielten eine erstklassige Ausbildung und waren begierig darauf, der Dynastie derer von Valancius zu dienen.
languages.original_text: Many years later, High Factotum Janris Danrok sought permission to retire. He said that age had softened his heart and that a more worthy, young, and assertive successor should take over his position. There was no shortage of candidates. Under all that fat, Danrok had a sentimental heart. He spared nothing for the orphans of those who had died serving the Rogue Trader. The children were given an excellent education and were eager to serve the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Jahre später bat Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok darum, sein Amt niederlegen zu dürfen. Er sagte, das Alter habe sein Herz erweicht und ein würdigerer, jüngerer, durchsetzungsfähigerer Nachfolger solle sein Amt übernehmen. Es gab reichlich Kandidaten. Unter all dem Fett hatte Danrok ein sentimentales Herz. Für die Waisen derer, die in Diensten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gestorben waren, scheute er keine Kosten und Mühen. Die Kinder erhielten eine erstklassige Ausbildung und waren begierig darauf, der Dynastie derer von Valancius zu dienen.

languages.text: Bien des années plus tard, le haut factotum Janris Danrok demanda à quitter son poste. Il expliqua que l'âge avait adouci son cœur et qu'il valait mieux qu'un successeur plus jeune, plus digne et plus ferme prenne sa place. Les candidats ne manquaient pas. Malgré les apparences, Danrok était quelqu'un de sentimental. Il avait toujours fait tout son possible pour aider les orphelins des personnes décédées au service {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Ces enfants s'étaient vu offrir une excellente éducation et se réjouissaient de pouvoir servir la dynastie von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Many years later, High Factotum Janris Danrok sought permission to retire. He said that age had softened his heart and that a more worthy, young, and assertive successor should take over his position. There was no shortage of candidates. Under all that fat, Danrok had a sentimental heart. He spared nothing for the orphans of those who had died serving the Rogue Trader. The children were given an excellent education and were eager to serve the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Des années plus tard, le haut factotum Janris Danrok décida de renoncer à son poste. Il expliqua que l'âge avait adouci son cœur et qu'il valait mieux qu’un successeur plus jeune, plus digne et plus ferme prenne sa place. Les candidats ne manquaient pas. Malgré les apparences, Danrok était quelqu'un de sentimental. Il avait toujours fait tout son possible pour aider les orphelins des personnes décédées au service {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Ces enfants s’étaient vu offrir une excellente éducation et se réjouissaient de pouvoir servir la dynastie von Valancius.

languages.text: Muchos años después, el Sumo Factótum Janris Danrok solicitó la dimisión. Dijo que la edad había ablandado su corazón y que un sucesor más digno, joven y firme debería hacerse con su puesto. No faltaban candidatos. Bajo toda su grasa, Danrok era un hombre sentimental. No reparó en gastos para los huérfanos de todos los fallecidos en servicio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Los niños recibieron una educación excelente y estaban entusiasmados por servir a la dinastía von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Many years later, High Factotum Janris Danrok sought permission to retire. He said that age had softened his heart and that a more worthy, young, and assertive successor should take over his position. There was no shortage of candidates. Under all that fat, Danrok had a sentimental heart. He spared nothing for the orphans of those who had died serving the Rogue Trader. The children were given an excellent education and were eager to serve the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Años después, el Sumo Factótum Janris Danrok solicitó la dimisión. Dijo que la edad había ablandado su corazón y que un sucesor más digno, joven y firme debería hacerse con su puesto. No faltaban candidatos. Bajo toda su grasa, Danrok era un hombre sentimental. No reparó en gastos para los huérfanos de todos los fallecidos en servicio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Los niños recibieron una educación excelente y estaban entusiasmados por servir a la dinastía von Valancius.

languages.text: それから長い年月が経ち、ハイ・ファクトタム・ジャンリス・ダンロックは引退の許可を求めた。彼は、年齢を重ねたことで心が和らぎ、より立派で若く、自己主張の強い後継者が自分の地位を引き継ぐべきだと言った。候補者には事欠かなかった。その太った体の下に、ダンロックには感傷的な心があった。彼は自由開拓者に仕えて死んだ者たちの遺児のために何も惜しまなかった。子供たちは素晴らしい教育を受け、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えることを熱望していた。
languages.original_text: Many years later, High Factotum Janris Danrok sought permission to retire. He said that age had softened his heart and that a more worthy, young, and assertive successor should take over his position. There was no shortage of candidates. Under all that fat, Danrok had a sentimental heart. He spared nothing for the orphans of those who had died serving the Rogue Trader. The children were given an excellent education and were eager to serve the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: 数年後、ハイ・ファクトタム・ジャンリス・ダンロックは辞任を申し出た。彼は、年齢を重ねたことで心が和らぎ、より立派で若く、自己主張の強い後継者が自分の地位を引き継ぐべきだと言った。候補者には事欠かなかった。その太った体の下に、ダンロックには感傷的な心があった。彼はローグトレーダーに仕えて死んだ者たちの遺児のために何も惜しまなかった。子供たちは素晴らしい教育を受け、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えることを熱望していた。

languages.text: Arşıkâhya Janris Danrok, yıllar sonra emekli olmak için izin istedi. Yaşının kalbini yumuşattığını ve bu göreve daha layık, genç ve kendinden emin birinin vazifesini devralması gerektiğini söyledi. Aday konusunda sıkıntı yoktu. Danrok, bütün o yağın altında duygusal bir kalbe sahipti. Hür Tacir'e hizmet ederken ölenlerin ardında bıraktığı öksüzler için hiçbir çabadan kaçınmadı. Çocuklara üst düzey bir eğitim verildi ve hepsi de von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet etmeye "son derece hevesli bireyler olarak yetişti.
languages.original_text: Many years later, High Factotum Janris Danrok sought permission to retire. He said that age had softened his heart and that a more worthy, young, and assertive successor should take over his position. There was no shortage of candidates. Under all that fat, Danrok had a sentimental heart. He spared nothing for the orphans of those who had died serving the Rogue Trader. The children were given an excellent education and were eager to serve the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Arşıkâhya Janris Danrok yıllar sonra emekli olmak için izin istedi. Yaşının kalbini yumuşattığını ve bu göreve daha layık, daha genç ve daha kendinden emin birinin bu vazifeyi devralması gerektiğini söyledi. Aday konusunda sıkıntı yoktu. Danrok, bütün o yağın altında duygusal bir kalbe sahipti. Hür Tacir'e hizmet ederken ölenlerin arkasında bıraktığı öksüzler için hiçbir çabadan kaçınmadı. Çocuklara üst düzey bir eğitim verildi ve hepsi de von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet etmek için son derece hevesli bireyler hâline geldi.
